items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t help but wonder if everybody was safe.
Do you think Tom would care if Mary didn\'t do that?
Do you think it\'ll be difficult for Tom to do that?
Tom didn\'t tell me how much the gift for Mary cost.
Tom didn\'t want to admit he had a drinking problem.
Tom didn\'t want to say anything to make Mary angry.
Tom didn\'t want to tell Mary that her son was dead.
Tom didn\'t want to tell us how he and Mary had met.
I don\'t think that either Tom or Mary will do that.
Tom didn\'t have to wear a suit and tie, but he did.
Tom didn\'t know anything at all about the accident.
Tell me what I\'m supposed to say, and I\'ll say it.
Tom fell asleep at the wheel and caused an accident.
Meat often gets discounted just before closing time.
Tom started playing the violin when he was thirteen.
Tom stood by the gate, drinking from a water bottle.
Tom stopped what he was doing and looked up at Mary.
There\'s a possibility that Tom will use my bicycle.
There\'s been a lot of tension between Tom and Mary.
There\'s no need for you to prepare a formal speech.
